snippet: The president said that the billions of dollars that would be saved from easing sentencing guidelines for nonviolent offenders and not incarcerating drug addicts could be spent on treatment programs.
abstract: Pres Obama announces number of small measures to address opioid addiction at event in Charleston, W Va, and calls for greater investments in prevention and treatment of addiction; West Virginia is hub of one of deadliest epidemics in American history.
